details: The script uses SURFGAN, a 3D Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) for image generation, leveraging Horovod for distributed training.
It utilizes TensorFlow as the deep learning framework and MPI for parallel execution.
Optuna is employed for hyperparameter optimization, while Python serves as the scripting language.
The script runs on a GPU node, utilizing both CPU and GPU resources for training.
MPI is employed for communication and coordination between processes.
The script requires network connectivity for data transfer and communication.
Significant storage space is required for model checkpoints, logs, and data.
